import img from '../../image/me.jpeg' import SocialMedia from '../icons /SocialMedia' import { useState } from 'react' import { TopItems, TopWrapper, Image, SearchIcon, TopList, Items, InputText, } from './TopBar.styled' import { NavLink, Outlet, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Form from '../Form/form' const Topbar = ({ activeRegister, registerLink }) => { const [activeSearch, setActiveSearch] = useState(true) const activeStyle = { textDecoration: 'underline', color: 'black', } const navLink = ({ isActive }) => (isActive ? activeStyle : undefined) const activeSearchHanlder = () => { setActiveSearch(false) } return ( <> Home Write Your Story {activeRegister ? 'Login' : 'Register'}

    ) } export default Topbar
